title: Draft a Corporate Resolution
description: A company needs to open a new bank account, which requires a formal corporate resolution. A paralegal needs to draft it.

tasks.description: Select the firm's template for a board resolution to open a bank account.
Populate the template with the company's name, the name of the bank, and the names of the authorized signatories.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent fills in all the specific details.

tasks.description: Prepare the resolution for the board of directors to sign.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete draft resolution is generated, ready for execution.
